title: ACC App
desc: A veterinary insurance card that provides care services, discounts, hotels and veterinary consultations.

title: SDC App
desc: A platform to search for personal trainers accredited by the platform within the clubs in which individuals participate, and the possibility of booking and paying per share inside or outside the club.

title: IDI App
desc: An application for pre-booking and payment in the restaurants and cafes sector for take-out or internal orders and free delivery service.
